title: can we rework graves?
body:
Seriously, i feel like just the idea of a tanky ranged champion that has high burst and mobility is something that should never have been put into a moba game at all. 

When there's a fed graves on the enemy team it's worse than release morde. You literally can't do anything, you just watch as this piece of shit wobbles up  to you and assblasts you with 1000+ dmg in a second.

And to top it all off he has insane sustain and a ranged aoe blind/slow.

What the actual fuck was riot thinking?

replies.body: Graves free 120 Armor and 120 free magic resistance is the problem.

Plus the "lets rush Death Dance" top Graves are cancer.  Tons of free tank stats + strong LS AND Kite that gives him more bullets so he doesn't actually every have to re-load.

I would be happy if they removed the extra bullet from the dash, or made the reload time about twice as long.  The re-load time is not even noticeable as it is now.

They could also make Death Dance not have Conditional Spell Vamp.  That would be a good enough hit to his top lane.

(I do not really know how these would affect him, but these are the problems I struggle with when against Graves top.)
